content: included in this pattern crochet instructions are included for making the hat jacket and scarf as well as instructions for making the books not crocheted this is designed for a 23 goose statue like the one sold by miles kimball https //amzn to/3adrwsp 2 yarn 300 yards worsted weight yarn substitute with colors of choice yarns used in the sample red heart super saver black 150 yds cafe late light grey 50 yards paddy green 50 yards white crochet hook h 5mm i 5 5mm supplies yarn needle for weaving in ends 1 button sewing needle matching thread optional measuring tape scissor applique books per book 2 pieces 5 x 7 chipboard balsa wood or similar for the inside of the books decopauge or craft glue paint brush varnish strong glue light sand paper measurements finished measurements measured flat sweater 8 from neck to bottom 13 5-14 wide across bottom edge hood - 9 5 from neck to top of hood gauge - 4 with an i hook = 13 half_double_crochet sts and 10 half_double_crochet rounds 2 https //amzn to/3adrwsp
